statements: UPDATE cybersecurity_reports SET report_name = 'Security Report 1', report_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE report_id = 'c7d77688-96bf-44b7-b810-b28d5811bd1e';
UPDATE cybersecurity_reports SET report_data = '{"status": "secure", "analysis": "good"}', report_name = 'Analysis Report' WHERE report_id = '463ecdfd-8612-4e32-9e16-1acff6fdf2ce';

UPDATE cybersecurity_reports SET report_name = 'Report A', report_date = '2021-10-15', report_data = '{"summary": "Report A Summary", "details": {"category": "Incidents", "severity": "High"}}' WHERE report_id = '60cc89e2-c999-4c0b-9d61-862d5d105219';

UPDATE cybersecurity_reports SET report_data = '{"summary": "Report B Summary", "details": {"category": "Risk Assessment", "severity": "Medium"}}', report_date = '2021-10-20', report_name = 'Report B' WHERE report_id = 'a6c7f802-f25b-462b-8074-af889a7f59d0';
UPDATE regulatory_reports SET compliance_status = 'true' WHERE report_id = 101;
UPDATE audit_logs SET description = 'User updated compliance status' WHERE log_id = 201;
UPDATE regulatory_reports SET compliance_status = TRUE WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE audit_logs SET description = 'User account updated' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE compliance_reports SET report_data = 'Updated report data' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE audit_logs SET log_description = 'Modified log description', log_timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE log_id = 3;
UPDATE compliance_reports SET report_data = 'Updated data for compliance report' WHERE report_id = 1001;
UPDATE audit_logs SET log_timestamp = '2022-03-15 10:45:00' WHERE log_id = 5002;
UPDATE RegulatoryBodies SET region='Europe' WHERE body_id=1;
UPDATE SQLDataReports SET report_date='2022-09-15' WHERE report_id=3;
UPDATE RegulatoryBodies SET region='Asia Pacific' WHERE body_id = 1;
UPDATE ComplianceVerification SET approved = TRUE, verification_date = '2023-10-15' WHERE verification_id = 3;
UPDATE regulatory_bodies SET contact_person = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE cybersecurity_domain SET certification_status = 'Certified', company_id = 100 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE regulatory_bodies SET contact_person = 'John Doe', contact_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE name = 'Health Regulation Authority';
UPDATE cybersecurity_domain SET certification_status = 'Certified' WHERE domain_name = 'Network Security' AND company_id = 12345;
